title: Like how Bard has his face on the map, put things from other champions on the map.
body:
For example:
Yasuo's sword lodged in a rock.
Solidified version of Ahri's ball.
Jarvan 4s crown.
There would be one for each champion placed somewhere on the map, standing out or hidden.

Really think it would add nice aesthetics to the game.

replies.body:
I think it would be a but much with one for every champion. Bard is a celestial being so it makes sense that he might have been to that place in the past and made his mark on it, but other things just wouldn't thematically fit in. Some things might, but definitely not one for every champion.

Overkill would also make it less special, re: Michael Bay.

What if there was a slight change to map before each champion came out.
It could be like the community get's to search for a clue on any map each time!
It was put on the map as a reveal for him, they'll probs be removed soon after his release.
Actually, I think that these will be permanent, and is where he will get his little spirit things from.
